title: fix: OrchestrationDataSource renew error. issue: #1773
body:
Fixes #1773.

Changes proposed in this pull request:
- correct process of OrchestrationDataSource renewing by this way:

while get DataSourceChangedEvent:
1. old datasources keep working(processing sql requests already received).
2. create new datasources, and new sql requests will get connections by these new datasources.
3. close old datasources gracefully.

title: Fixes #1429: Performance enhancement of backend connect with database by NIO in sharding-proxy
body:
Fixes #1429.

Changes proposed in this pull request:
- Replace CountDownLatch with List and Count (means trade space for time), and remove SynchronizedFuture.
- Initialize channel pools for every eventLoop of frontend handler and data source name.
- If the query results need to be merged, use other thread pool to process for no-blocking.

title: Support more `distinct` syntaxes
body:
Fixes #1654.

Support more distinct syntaxes, which are as follows:
```
SELECT DISTINCT(col1) FROM tbl_name
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT col1 + col2) FROM tbl_name
SELECT AVG(DISTINCT col1) FROM tbl_name
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT col1), SUM(DISTINCT col1) FROM tbl_name
SELECT col1, COUNT(DISTINCT col2) FROM tbl_name GROUP BY col1
```
